2024: A Year of Building and Growing

From beta testing to our Rounds launch, 2024 was a transformative year for Pulse. Here's our journey of building, learning, and growing together.

Our Journey Through 2024

A timeline of key moments that shaped our year

January

Beta Launch

Launched our beta version in the App Store with limited features, beginning our journey with early adopters.

April

Beta Completion

Successfully completed three rounds of beta testing, implementing valuable user feedback.

May

Public Launch

Officially launched Pulse 1.0 to the public, marking our first major release.

July

Operation Hope

Graduated from Operation Hope program in Atlanta, expanding our business knowledge.

September

Web Development

Kicked off web app development and complete website redesign.

December

Rounds Launch

Launched Rounds feature with successful kickoff event at SoulCycle Buckhead.

A detailed look at our progress throughout the year
